emailAwaitApprovalOnCashAdvance.description: Send email when a cash advance is awaiting approval, defaulted to true.

emailAwaitApprovalOnPayment.description: Send email when a payment is awaiting approval, defaulted to true.

emailAwaitApprovalOnReport.description: Send email when a report is awaiting approval, defaulted to true.

emailAwaitApprovalOnTravelRequest.description: Send email when a travel request is awaiting approval, defaulted to true.

emailStatusChangeOnCashAdvance.description: Send email when the cash advance status changes, defaulted to true.

emailStatusChangeOnPayment.description: Send email when the payment status changes, defaulted to true.

emailStatusChangeOnReport.description: Send email when the report status changes, defaulted to true.

emailStatusChangeOnTravelRequest.description: Send email when the travel request status changes, defaulted to true.

promptForApproverOnPaymentSubmit.description: Prompt for approver when submitting a payment, defaulted to false.

promptForApproverOnReportSubmit.description: Prompt for approver when submitting a report, defaulted to false.

promptForApproverOnTravelRequestSubmit.description: Prompt for approver when submitting a travel request, defaulted to false.

bulkId.description: Transient identifier of newly created resource, unique within a bulk request. REQUIRED when "method" is "POST"

delegateProdCode.description: A list of Delegate associated with the Delegate's product code.

canPrepareForApproval.description: Determines if delegate can prepare for approval

canReceiveApprovalEmail.description: Determines if delegate can receive approval emails

canReceiveEmail.description: Determines if delegate can receive emails

canSubmitTravelRequest.description: Determines if delegate can submit travel request

canUseBi.description: Determines if delegate can use BI

canViewReceipt.description: Determines if delegate can view receipts

$ref.description: The URI reference for the user

employeeNumber.description: The employee number for the user

value.description: The internal UUID identifier for the user

temporaryDelegation.description: Determines if delegate can temporarily approve

temporaryDelegationFromDate.description: Start date for delegates temporary approval permissions. Valid ISO 8601 Date

temporaryDelegationToDate.description: End date for delegates temporary approval permissions. Valid ISO 8601 Date

customFields.description: user can set values to custom data fields

value.description: Value for the given custom field

groups.description: List of user groups that user belongs to for certain permissions

hasNoMiddleName.description: flag for if user has no middle name

orgUnit.description: The name of the org unit user belongs to

ruleClass.description: Defines the rule class for the travel user either id or name should be provided

id.description: valid Rule class id to be assigned

travelCrsName.description: The name of the profile in the GDS system

xmlProfileSyncId.description: client-assigned Travel user identifier that allows the user profile to be synchronized with other vendors

active.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the User is active.

addresses.description: Physical mailing addresses for the User.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

type.description: A label indicating the function of the address, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

dateOfBirth.description: The user's date of birth , in YYYY-MM-DD format

displayName.description: The name of the User, suitable for display to end-users.

type.description: A label indicating the function of the address, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

verified.description: flag to note which email has been verified by the user.

emergencyContacts.description: Emergency Contact information for the User.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

entitlements.description: The features enabled for the user

externalId.description: User identifier from the provisioning client

id.description: Unique identifier for the user - a uuid

localeOverrides.description: Support for users who want to override locale settings

preference24Hour.description: preferred time format for the user

preferenceCurrencySymbolLocation.description: preferred currency symbol location for the user

preferenceDateFormat.description: preferred date format for the user

preferenceDefaultCalView.description: preferred default calendar view for the user

preferenceEndDayViewHour.description: preferred hour setting for the end of day, 0-23

preferenceFirstDayOfWeek.description: preferred first day of the week for the user

preferenceHourMinuteSeparator.description: preferred separator between hour and minute

preferenceNegativeCurrencyFormat.description: preferred negative currency format for the user

preferenceNegativeNumberFormat.description: preferred negative number format for the user

preferenceNumberFormat.description: preferred number format for the user

preferenceStartDayViewHour.description: preferred hour setting for the start of day, 0-23

academicTitle.description: Title signifying level of academic achievement

familyName.description: The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Jensen' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

familyNamePrefix.description: The family name prefix of the User (e.g. 'van' given the full name 'Vincent van Gogh')

formatted.description: The full name, formatted for display (e.g., 'Jensen, Barbara Jane').

givenName.description: The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Barbara' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

honorificPrefix.description: The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages (e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

honorificSuffix.description: The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or suffix in most Western languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

legalName.description: The legal name of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

middleInitial.description: middle initial, if the user has a middle name

middleName.description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

nickName.description: The casual way to address the user in real  life, e.g., 'Bob' or 'Bobby' instead of 'Robert'.  This attribute  SHOULD NOT be used to represent a User's username (e.g., 'bjensen' or  'mpepperidge').

display.description: Phone number canonicalized to RFC3966 format

issuingCountry.description: Issuing country for mobile devices (type=mobile); two-letter code per ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

type.description: A label indicating the phone number's function, e.g., 'work', 'home'.

preferredLanguage.description: Indicates the User's preferred written or spoken language.  Generally used for selecting a localized user interface

timezone.description: The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone database format, e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'.

title.description: user's job title in the company

userName.description: The name that can be used to login to CTE

messages.description: Additional messages in case of errors / warnings

approverType.description: A list of Approvers associated with the Approver's type.

approver.description: The user reference for the approver

$ref.description: The URI reference for the user

employeeNumber.description: The employee number for the user

value.description: The internal UUID identifier for the user

primary.description: The value for indicating whether the associated user is primary approver

companyCode.description: The company code for the employee within ADP.

deductionCode.description: The deduction code for the employee within ADP.

employeeFileNumber.description: The identifier for the employee within ADP, also known as the "Employee File Number".

employeeNumber.description: Client supplied employee's number within the company, unique for the company

$ref.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the referenced user.

terminationDate.description: Termination Date, in YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format, if the employee is terminated, this can also be used to calculate the data retention period

allowCreditCardTransArrivalEmails.description: Allow Credit Card Transaction Arrival Notification Emails, defaulted to true.

allowReceiptImageAvailEmails.description: Send email when faxed receipts are successfully received, defaulted to true.

autoAddTripCardTransOnReport.description: Add company card transactions within trip dates to 1 click expense report.

processorReportAccess.description: Report access for processor roles (Expense Processor, Expense Processor Audit, Expense Processor Manager)
enum: All reports Pending processor and above

promptForCardTransactionsOnReport.description: Prompt for Company Card Transactions when creating a new report, defaulted to true.

promptForReportPrintFormat.description: Always prompt for the report format before printing.

showImagingIntro.description: Display imaging introduction, defaulted to true.

showInstructHelpPanel.description: Display instructional help, defaulted to true.

showTotalOnReport.description: Show Report Totals on Detailed Report.

biHierarchy.description: The object containing the long code and the sync guid of the last list item in Reporting Hierarchy. This is only for UAC(Unified Analytics of Concur).

code.description: The long code of the last list item in Reporting Hierarchy. This is only for UAC(Unified Analytics of Concur).

href.description: The URI to the last list item in Reporting Hierarchy. This is only for UAC(Unified Analytics of Concur).

syncGuid.description: The sync guid of the last list item in Reporting Hierarchy. This is only for UAC(Unified Analytics of Concur).

biManager.description: The UUID of the Reporting Manager

budgetCountryCode.description: Valid ISO 3166 country code for Budget

ledgerCode.description: Ledger code to associate with the user

locale.description: Valid locale from the list of configured locales as defined in [RFC5646]

nonEmployee.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the User is a NonEmployee

reimbursementCurrency.description: Valid three digit or letter currency code in the list of system reimbursement currencies

reimbursementType.description: The reimbursement type for the user

schemaCustomData.description: The Custom Data associated with this user

href.description: The list service endpoint to fetch the specific item information.

syncGuid.description: The sync_guid value of the custom field

value.description: Value of the custom field - For list = List Item Code

testEmployee.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the User is a test user. Can't be modified after the user is created. Can only be set at creation.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of operations returned in current response

operations.description: Status of each operation of the provisioning request

messages.description: Additional messages in case of errors / warnings

operationsCount.description: Count of operations in a provision request

totalResults.description: The total number of operations in a bulk provisioning request

roleGroups.description: Group(s) to be associated with the Expense Role

204.description: No error, the operation was successful
